Test Piece Contest
The Bohemian Girl [arr. Round]
Shildon, County Durham Contest promoted by New Shildon Temperance band. March contest - 1st Hartlepool Operatic, 2nd Hartlepool Borough. Prizes - 1st £16, 2nd £8, 3rd £4. 3 bands competed.
June 3, 2019, 9:28 p.m. June 3, 2019, 9:33 p.m.
1 West Hartlepool Old William Holdsworth
2 Hartlepool Borough Prize Joseph Jackson
3 Hebburn Colliery Thomas Henderson
